bill.title: Distinctive license tags; revise distribution of fees collected from tags displaying emblem of certain out-of-state university.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-19-56.15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags That Display The Emblems Of Universities Located In Other States, To Revise The Distribution Of Fees Collected From The Issuance Of Distinctive License Tags Displaying The Emblem Of The University Of Alabama; To Provide That The Fee Collected From Such Distinctive License Tags Shall Be Deposited Into A Special Fund In The State Treasury To The Credit Of The Blair E. Batson Hospital For Children At The University Of Mississippi Medical Center; And For Related Purposes.
